name: Scott The Intern
description:
Scott the intern's done it again and his malfunctioning robots are out of containment!

Half of them are screaming at the sight of him and the other half seem to be in love!

Help him herd his defective robots back into the facility before they start wandering into any lasers, but don't set off any alarms! Scott's made quite enough cups of apology coffee as it i...

WASD Movement

E Exit Level (When in green endzone)

[Blue Robots] Affectionate

[Red Robots] Terrified
